message.content:
üö® AUFGABE: Du MUSST das existierende Dashboard √§ndern und deployen!

User-Anfrage: "Kursverwaltungssystem

Ich brauche eine App um Kurse zu verwalten:
- Kurse mit Titel, Beschreibung, Startdatum, Enddatum, maximale Teilnehmer, Preis
- Dozenten die Kurse halten (Name, E-Mail, Telefon, Fachgebiet)
- Teilnehmer die sich anmelden (Name, E-Mail, Telefon, Geburtsdatum)
- R√§ume wo Kurse stattfinden (Raumname, Geb√§ude, Kapazit√§t)
- Anmeldungen (welcher Teilnehmer zu welchem Kurs, Anmeldedatum, Bezahlt ja/nein)

Ich will alle diese Daten selbst verwalten k√∂nnen."

PFLICHT-SCHRITTE (alle m√ºssen ausgef√ºhrt werden):

1. LESEN: Lies src/pages/Dashboard.tsx um die aktuelle Struktur zu verstehen
2. √ÑNDERN: Implementiere die User-Anfrage mit dem Edit-Tool
3. TESTEN: F√ºhre 'npm run build' aus um sicherzustellen dass es kompiliert
4. DEPLOYEN: Rufe deploy_to_github auf um die √Ñnderungen zu pushen

‚ö†Ô∏è KRITISCH:
- Du MUSST √Ñnderungen am Code machen (Edit-Tool verwenden!)
- Du MUSST am Ende deploy_to_github aufrufen!
- Beende NICHT ohne zu deployen!
- Analysieren alleine reicht NICHT - du musst HANDELN!

Das Dashboard existiert bereits. Mache NUR die angeforderten √Ñnderungen, nicht mehr.
Starte JETZT mit Schritt 1!

content.text:
This is a **Kursverwaltungssystem** (Course Management System) - evokes professional education admin tools like Coursera Admin, university portals, or German VHS systems. I'll create a clean, professional design with an academic/professional feel.

**Design Inspiration:** German education platforms, clean administrative dashboards with data tables.

**Features for V1:**
- 5 entities with full CRUD: Dozenten, Teilnehmer, R√§ume, Kurse, Anmeldungen
- Tab-based navigation
- Data tables with inline editing
- Forms for adding new records
- Professional academic color scheme

**Design:** Deep indigo/blue academic theme with warm accent. Plus Jakarta Sans font for professional clarity.

Let me create the design system and all components.

input.content:
# Design Brief: Kursverwaltungssystem

## 1. App Analysis
- **What this app does:** Manages courses, instructors (Dozenten), participants (Teilnehmer), rooms (R√§ume), and registrations (Anmeldungen) for an educational institution
- **Who uses this:** Administrative staff at educational institutions (VHS, training centers)
- **The ONE thing users care about most:** Quick access to course registrations and participant management
- **Primary actions:** Add/edit courses, register participants, manage instructor assignments

## 2. What Makes This Design Distinctive
- **Visual identity:** Professional academic feel with deep indigo gradients, subtle warmth
- **Layout strategy:** Tab-based navigation with hero stats at top, data tables below
- **Unique element:** Colored entity indicators (each entity type has a distinct accent)

## 3. Theme & Colors
- **Font:** Plus Jakarta Sans (geometric, professional, highly readable)
- **Google Fonts URL:** https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap
- **Color palette:**
  - Primary: hsl(230, 70%, 45%) - Deep indigo
  - Primary glow: hsl(230, 70%, 65%)
  - Accent: hsl(25, 95%, 55%) - Warm orange for CTAs
  - Success: hsl(150, 60%, 40%) - Paid/confirmed status
  - Entity colors: Kurse (indigo), Dozenten (violet), Teilnehmer (cyan), R√§ume (amber), Anmeldungen (emerald)

## 4. Mobile Layout
- Stacked tabs (scrollable horizontal)
- Full-width cards for data
- Bottom sheet for forms

## 5. Desktop Layout
- Fixed sidebar tabs on left
- Main content area with stats header + data table
- Modal dialogs for forms

## 6. Components
- **Hero KPI:** Total active courses + upcoming registrations
- **Secondary KPIs:** Dozenten count, Teilnehmer count, available R√§ume
- **Data tables:** Sortable, filterable per entity
- **Primary Action Button:** "+ Neu" button for each entity

## 7. Visual Details
- Border radius: 12px (cards), 8px (buttons)
- Shadows: Subtle with primary color tint
- Spacing: 24px sections, 16px within cards
- Animations: Subtle fade/slide on tab switch

## 8. CSS Variables
See index.css for full implementation

content.content: File created successfully at: /home/user/app/design_brief.md

# Design Brief: Kursverwaltungssystem

## 1. App Analysis
- **What this app does:** Manages courses, instructors (Dozenten), participants (Teilnehmer), rooms (R√§ume), and registrations (Anmeldungen) for an educational institution
- **Who uses this:** Administrative staff at educational institutions (VHS, training centers)
- **The ONE thing users care about most:** Quick access to course registrations and participant management
- **Primary actions:** Add/edit courses, register participants, manage instructor assignments

## 2. What Makes This Design Distinctive
- **Visual identity:** Professional academic feel with deep indigo gradients, subtle warmth
- **Layout strategy:** Tab-based navigation with hero stats at top, data tables below
- **Unique element:** Colored entity indicators (each entity type has a distinct accent)

## 3. Theme & Colors
- **Font:** Plus Jakarta Sans (geometric, professional, highly readable)
- **Google Fonts URL:** https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap
- **Color palette:**
  - Primary: hsl(230, 70%, 45%) - Deep indigo
  - Primary glow: hsl(230, 70%, 65%)
  - Accent: hsl(25, 95%, 55%) - Warm orange for CTAs
  - Success: hsl(150, 60%, 40%) - Paid/confirmed status
  - Entity colors: Kurse (indigo), Dozenten (violet), Teilnehmer (cyan), R√§ume (amber), Anmeldungen (emerald)

## 4. Mobile Layout
- Stacked tabs (scrollable horizontal)
- Full-width cards for data
- Bottom sheet for forms

## 5. Desktop Layout
- Fixed sidebar tabs on left
- Main content area with stats header + data table
- Modal dialogs for forms

## 6. Components
- **Hero KPI:** Total active courses + upcoming registrations
- **Secondary KPIs:** Dozenten count, Teilnehmer count, available R√§ume
- **Data tables:** Sortable, filterable per entity
- **Primary Action Button:** "+ Neu" button for each entity

## 7. Visual Details
- Border radius: 12px (cards), 8px (buttons)
- Shadows: Subtle with primary color tint
- Spacing: 24px sections, 16px within cards
- Animations: Subtle fade/slide on tab switch

## 8. CSS Variables
See index.css for full implementation

content.text: Now let me read the generated types and service to wire up the API properly.
Now I need to update the Dashboard to use the real API service instead of mock data. Let me rewrite the Dashboard with proper API integration.

lines: +import type { Dozenten, Teilnehmer, Raeume, Kurse, Anmeldungen } from '@/types/app';
const tabs: { id: TabId; label: string; icon: React.ElementType }[] = [
-// Mock data - will be replaced with API
-  { record_id: '1', name: 'Dr. Maria Schmidt', email: 'schmidt@kurse.de', telefon: '0171-1234567', fachgebiet: 'Informatik' },
-  { record_id: '2', name: 'Prof. Hans M√ºller', email: 'mueller@kurse.de', telefon: '0172-2345678', fachgebiet: 'BWL' },
-  { record_id: '1', name: 'Anna Weber', email: 'anna.weber@mail.de', telefon: '0173-3456789', geburtsdatum: '1995-03-15' },
-  { record_id: '2', name: 'Max Fischer', email: 'max.fischer@mail.de', telefon: '0174-4567890', geburtsdatum: '1988-07-22' },

-  { record_id: '1', titel: 'Python Grundkurs', beschreibung: 'Einf√ºhrung in Python', startdatum: '2024-03-01', enddatum: '2024-03-15', max_teilnehmer: 20, preis: 299, dozent_id: '1', raum_id: '2' },

-  { record_id: '2', titel: 'BWL Basics', beschreibung: 'Grundlagen der Betriebswirtschaft', startdatum: '2024-04-01', enddatum: '2024-04-30', max_teilnehmer: 25, preis: 399, dozent_id: '2', raum_id: '1' },
-  { record_id: '1', teilnehmer_id: '1', kurs_id: '1', anmeldedatum: '2024-02-15', bezahlt: true },
-  { record_id: '2', teilnehmer_id: '2', kurs_id: '1', anmeldedatum: '2024-02-18', bezahlt: false },
+      const [doz, teil, raeu, kur, anm] = await Promise.all([
-          setDozenten(prev => prev.map(d => d.record_id === id ? item : d));
-          setTeilnehmer(prev => prev.map(t => t.record_id === id ? item : t));
-          setRaeume(prev => prev.map(r => r.record_id === id ? item : r));
-          setKurse(prev => prev.map(k => k.record_id === id ? item : k));
-          setAnmeldungen(prev => prev.map(a => a.record_id === id ? item : a));
-  const getDozentName = (id: string) => dozenten.find(d => d.record_id === id)?.name || '-';
-  const getTeilnehmerName = (id: string) => teilnehmer.find(t => t.record_id === id)?.name || '-';
-  const getKursTitel = (id: string) => kurse.find(k => k.record_id === id)?.titel || '-';
-  const getRaumName = (id: string) => raeume.find(r => r.record_id === id)?.raumname || '-';
+          <Loader2 className="w-10 h-10 animate-spin text-primary mx-auto mb-4" />
function KurseTable({ data, getDozentName, getRaumName, onEdit, onDelete }: {
-                {format(new Date(item.startdatum), 'dd.MM.yy', { locale: de })} - {format(new Date(item.enddatum), 'dd.MM.yy', { locale: de })}

+                {item.fields.startdatum && format(new Date(item.fields.startdatum), 'dd.MM.yy', { locale: de })} - {item.fields.enddatum && format(new Date(item.fields.enddatum), 'dd.MM.yy', { locale: de })}
function AnmeldungenTable({ data, getTeilnehmerName, getKursTitel, onEdit, onDelete }: {
-function FormModal({ tab, item, onSave, onClose, dozenten, teilnehmer, kurse, raeume }: {
+function FormModal({ tab, item, onSave, onClose, dozenten, teilnehmer, kurse, raeume, saving }: {
+  // Initialize form data based on entity type
<select className="form-input" value={formData.dozent_id || ''} onChange={(e) => update('dozent_id', e.target.value)} required>
<select className="form-input" value={formData.raum_id || ''} onChange={(e) => update('raum_id', e.target.value)} required>
<select className="form-input" value={formData.teilnehmer_id || ''} onChange={(e) => update('teilnehmer_id', e.target.value)} required>
